title: Scenario toss coins into coffee can - IV

content.question: Which of the following elements constitutes the independent variable in the study?

choices.label: The number of successful coin tosses
The number of coins the participants tossed
The feedback about relative performance in coin tossing

content.answer: The feedback about relative performance in coin tossing

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
